summary: Fact-based war drama about an American battalion of over 500 men which gets trapped behind enemy lines in the Argonne Forest in October 1918 France during the closing weeks of World War I.
cast: Ricky Schroder|Phil McKee|Jamie Harris|Jay Rodan|Adam James|Daniel Caltagirone|Michael Goldstrom|André Vippolis|Rhys Miles Thomas|Arthur Kremer|Adam Kotz|Justin Scot|Anthony Azizi|George Calil|Wolf Kahler|Joachim Paul Assböck|Michael Brandon|Paul Courtenay Hyu|Josh Cohen|Tim Matthews|Finbar Lynch|Hugh Fraser|Ben Andrews|Derek Kueter|Nicolas de Pruyssenaere|Jamie Treacher
title: El batallón perdido
